feed.title: Contact
feed.subtitle: A total beginner's foray into the world of game design and development.

entry.title: Project Links
entry.content: Check out the code for more info on how I made the Snake vs Block game in javafx and using the concepts of object oriented programming. Check out my Unreal Engine4 landscape which was built from scratch (including the heightmap). Also check out myu recent projects on Blender.
entry.summary: Check out the code for more info on how I made the Snake vs Block game in javafx and using the concepts of object oriented programming. Check out my Unreal Engine4 landscape which was built from scratch (including the heightmap). Also check out myu recent projects on Blender.
